overview: As CEO, James F. Hensel guides Pac-Westâ€™s continued growth by leading the evolution of groundbreaking technology into revolutionary, next generation products that cultivate new and revitalized revenue streams for carriers. Hensel has a worked with Pac-West for almost five years as a member of its board of directors, and has served as Senior Vice President of Columbia Ventures Corporation (CVC), Pac-Westâ€™s parent company, since 2005. CVCâ€™s other telecom portfolio companies include Hibernia Atlantic, Magnet Networks, Pivotel Group, and PocketiNet Communications. Hensel holds a BA in economics from Harvard University and a JD from Willamette University College of Law. In addition to numerous board positions with CVC controlled entities, Mr. Hensel also serves on the board of Saladax, Inc and the Oregon Food Bank.
